newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Soriano to amend price on rights issue.
newsitem.headline: Soriano to amend price on rights issue.

text.p: Philippines' A. Soriano Corp (Anscor) said on Tuesday its board of director had decided to amend the rights price of 3.00 pesos set last June 18.

"The Board of Directors on November 25 resolved to amend the company's stock rights offer price ... to a price to be determined by the company's executive committee, in consultation with the issue manager and lead international underwriters," the company told the Philippine Stock Exchange.
The price shall be based on a maximum discount of 15 percent to Anscor's weighted average price for 30 days prior to the price setting.
The company is offering a three for five rights offer.
The stock was trading at 2.85 pesos per share at midesssion on Tuesday.
The company has stakes in brokerage, construction material, leisure, transporatation and fertiliser companies.
